Charlie Thorpe-Campbell is the greatest RAM-runner the world has ever seenâ€“and he knows it. On the verge of retirement from the sport, he is defending his title as champion of the annual orbital race one final time when heâ€™s suddenly hurtling away into deep space.

Charlieâ€™s unscheduled voyage through a wormhole ends with a crash-landing on a most unusual planet, with scores of spacecraft from all corners of the universe in orbit. Seeking help, he heads toward what appears to be civilization, unaware of the horrors waiting for him thereâ€¦
Once inside the great, orb-covered city, Charlie is thrust into intergalactic competition by a bloodthirsty alien race. When he discovers he can use his unique abilities to save not only himself, but the entire galaxy, will he face up to the challengeâ€“or run from it?
